definition: pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: Peddling a handful can lead to a 15-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 兜售一把藥可能引來15年監禁。

sentences.english: But it is still unclear what information was actually peddled.
sentences.chinese: 但是到底兜售什麼信息纔算內幕交易還仍不明瞭。

sentences.english: The French try to sell us their image as great lovers.
sentences.chinese: 法國人想把他們的形象作爲大情種兜售給我們。

sentences.english: Now Gabi runs a website where she charges fans for videos and pictures.
sentences.chinese: 如今加比經營着一家向其粉絲兜售視頻和照片的網站。

sentences.english: He got a job as a door-to-door salesman with a double-glazing company.
sentences.chinese: 他找到了爲一家雙層玻璃公司上門兜售貨物的工作。

sentences.english: Some were haggling loudly with traders as they hawked their wares.
sentences.chinese: 有些人正在大聲同兜售貨物的商販講價錢。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那個農民挨家挨戶兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: I called another newspaper and repeated my offer over the phone.I expanded it.
sentences.chinese: 我又給另一家報社打電話，向他們兜售我的提議。

sentences.english: They are a selling tool for the cheater.
sentences.chinese: 他們是一個兜售工具的騙子。

sentences.english: His attempts to peddle his paintings around London's tiny gallery scene proved unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 他到倫敦小畫廊兜售自己的畫作，結果碰了一鼻子灰。

sentences.english: There is also concern that North Korea will resume selling nuclear technology abroad.
sentences.chinese: 大家也擔心，北韓又將會開始向海外兜售核武技術。

sentences.english: They hyped up the crowd with TV to sell their political policy.
sentences.chinese: 他們利用電視廣播向羣衆大力兜售他們的政策。

sentences.english: The Professor is, in fact, peddling pseudoscience.
sentences.chinese: 這位教授，事實上在兜售僞科學。

sentences.english: Fish and Chips stall for hungry passersby 's.
sentences.chinese: 向肚餓的行人兜售魚和薯片的路邊攤。

sentences.english: Genetically modified foods have been foisted2 on an unwitting public without adequate testing.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因食物沒有經過適當檢驗就兜售給不知情的大衆。

definition: to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to resell at a profit/to speculate
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to mark down (the price of goods)/to sell off cheap
